name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Daniel F. ZEIGLER, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Zeigler

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Daniel F. ZEIGLER, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of June, 2006, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated March 17, 2006, it is hereby
ORDERED that Daniel F. Zeigler be and he is suspended from the Bar of this Commonwealth for a period of three years, and he shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217 Pa.R.D.E.
It is further ORDERED that respondent shall pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
901 A.2d 474
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Daniel F. ZEIGLER, Respondent.
No. 1143 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 14, 2006.
